pages.text: Kamen Rider Craft includes a new set of villager professions, as well as new trade offers for existing ones.

pages.name: Shocker Villager
pages.text: Uses the $(l:misc/blocks/shocker_monitor)Shocker Monitor$(/l) as a job block

Novice Trades:$(li)$(l:x/items/perfecter)Perfecter$(/l) for 1 $(l:x/items/ridol_core)Ridol Core$(/l)$(li)$(l:ichigo/items/shocker_emblem)Shocker Emblem$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:shin/items/shin_stone)Shin Stone$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:zo/items/zo_stone)ZO Stone$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:j/items/j_stone)J Stone$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(br2)Apprentice Trades:$(li)$(l:g/items/goro_wine_bottle)Goro Wine Bottle$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:misc/items/sinister_pachinko_ball)Sinister Pachinko Ball$(/l) for 4 emeralds$(br2)Journeyman Trades:$(li)$(l:misc/blocks/ichigo_chair)Ichigo Chair$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:ichigo/items/nophoon_core)Nophoon Core$(/l) for 2 emeralds

pages.name: Humagear Villager
pages.text: Uses the $(l:misc/blocks/hiden_3d_printer)HIDEN 3D Printer$(/l) as a job block

Novice Trades:$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/blank_progrisekey)Blank Progrisekey$(/l) for 1 emerald$(li)1 emerald for 3 $(l:zero_one/items/hiden_metal)Hiden Metal$(/l)$(br2)Apprentice Trades:$(li)3 $(l:zero_one/items/humagear_progrisekey)Humagear Progrisekeys$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(br2)Journeyman Trades:$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/thousand_key)Thousand Key$(/l) for 12 emeralds

pages.name: Kamen Cafe Butler
pages.text: Uses the $(l:misc/blocks/kamen_cafe_counter)Kamen Cafe Counter$(/l) as a job block

Novice Trades:$(li)3 $(l:ride_kamens/items/candy)Nourishing Candy S$(/l) for 1 emerald$(li)$(l:ride_kamens/items/contract_chaostone)Contract Chaostone$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(br2)Apprentice Trades:$(li)$(l:ride_kamens/items/gasha_ticket)Gasha Ticket$(/l) for 6 emeralds$(li)$(l:ride_kamens/items/energy_drink)Energy Drink$(/l) for 2 emeralds

pages.name: Stomach Inc. Agent
pages.text: Uses the $(l:misc/blocks/heatpress_extractor)Heatpress Extractor$(/l) as a job block

Novice Trades:$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/doppudding_gochizo)Doppudding Gochizo$(/l) for 1 $(l:gavv/items/heatpress)Heatpress$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/purujelly_gochizo)Purujelly Gochizo$(/l) for 2 $(l:gavv/items/heatpress)Heatpresses$(/l)

Novice Trades:$(li)$(l:ichigo/items/rider3_vs_the_demon_of_general_black)Rider 3 vs. The Demon of General Black Manga$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:kuuga/items/kuuga_manga)Kuuga Manga$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(br2)Apprentice Trades:$(li)$(l:misc/items/card_warrior_kamen_rider_manga)Card Warrior Kamen Rider Manga$(/l) for 2 emeralds

Trades:$(li)$(l:misc/blocks/decor_blocks#ginga_meteor)Ginga Meteor Rock$(/l) for 3 emeralds$(li)$(l:misc/blocks/helheim_sapling)Helheim Sapling$(/l) for 2 emeralds$(li)$(l:misc/items/kuuga_amazing_mighty_artist)S.I.C. Hero Saga$(/l) for 2 emeralds
